resources.string: "Please say \"HEY SPEAR\" to change grammar to Demo Commands"
"Please say the following commands: 1. Say \"{stop_spear}\" to put back SPEAR in wake-up grammar OR 2. {available_commands}"

"Please say the following commands: 1. Say \"{stop_spear}\" to put back SPEAR in wake-up grammar OR 2. Say \"{switch_grammar}\" to switch to pre-compiled aviation commands grammar OR 3. Say \"{switch_label_grammar}\" to switch to label commands grammar OR 4. {available_commands}"
"Trial time is used up! Please restart the Demo application."
"Recognition engine is terminated unexpectedly, please contact developer for help."
